text: Goodou go agu daangada, e hai behee? Goodou hagalee e langaadia i di godou hai nia mee gulugulua aanei? Deeai, goodou hagalee e langaadia, gei goodou hogi e de iloo e goodou di tee. Malaa, deenei gaa hidi ai goodou gaa too gadoo be digau ala i golo guu too. I dogu madagoaa ma ga hagaduadua goodou, deenei dela go di godou hagaodi. Ma ko Au go Dimaadua ne helekai.
